scene.name: scene_grotto
scene.title: grotto

hotspot.name: AustinText
hotspot.html: This drawing shows the historic Austin hall in 1930

hotspot.name: AlumniText
hotspot.html: Alumni hall is the oldest surviving building on campus, built in 1848. This early photograph from between 1899 and 1903 shows the building among snow

scene.name: scene_kennedy_pano3
scene.title: kennedy_pano3

hotspot.name: ConnellyText
hotspot.html: Connelly hall was completed in 1980. This image shows the dedication ceremony on September 21, 1980, with Cardinal Krol, the Archbishop of of Philadelphia blessing the new building.

hotspot.name: KennedyText
hotspot.html: Kennedy hall was built in 19??, and was named for US President John F. Kennedy in 1969. JFK received an honorary diploma from Villanova in 1957.
